mapper.select: SELECT st.rownum as stNum, st.stGrade as stGrade, st.stSchoolClass as stSchoolClass, st.stTitle as stTitle, st.stMessage as stMessage, st.stDate as stDate, st.stWriter as stWriter, st.stCategoly as stCategoly, st.stHit as stHit FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum, STUDENTPROPOSAL.* FROM STUDENTPROPOSAL, (SELECT @rownum :=0) n ORDER BY rownum ASC ) st WHERE st.rownum BETWEEN #{num1} AND #{num2} ORDER BY rownum ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENTPROPOSAL(stGrade, stSchoolClass, stTitle, stMessage, stWriter, stCategoly, stHit) VALUES( #{stGrade}, #{stSchoolClass}, #{stTitle}, #{stMessage}, #{stWriter}, #{stCategoly}, 0)
